original_title: Piano sul pianeta (malgrado tutto coraggio Francesco!)
overview: Whoever crosses the threshold of a mental health institution immediately finds themselves on a different planet. In PIANO SUL PIANETA, Fabrizio Ferraroâ€™s superb black-and-white images create a dystopian tale, suspended in time but hugely restricted in space.
title: Piano sul pianeta (malgrado tutto coraggio Francesco!)
